overview: Shawn brings more than 14 years of executive leadership experience in the Internet and computer service industry to his position of Executive Vice President of Sutus. Prior to undertaking this role he was president of Conducive Corporation a New York based online advertising company which acquired ADZILLA new media, a company he was CEO of and co-founded in 2003. Formerly he was the Chairman and CEO of Voyus Ltd., a leading remote IT solutions company he co-founded in 1998. Shawn was instrumental in growing Voyus to more than 120 employees and $22 million in revenues in a three-year period. Shawnâ€™s high-tech career began with Canada Internet Direct a pioneering ISP that became one of Canadaâ€™s largest independents prior to being sold to Look Communications. Shawn was named one of Vancouverâ€™s â€œTop 40 Under 40â€ Entrepreneurs of the Year by Business in Vancouver and has also earned two nominations for the Ernst and Young â€œEntrepreneur of the Yearâ€ award, a prestigious Canada-wide competition. Shawn is a Business Administration graduate with a specialization in Marketing Management.
